expected.meta_description: A top regional Federal Reserve official sharply criticized Friday the Fed's ongoing policy of keeping interest rates near zero -- and at record lows -- as a "dangerous gamble."
expected.meta_keywords: federal, reserve's, low, rate, policy, is, a, 'dangerous, gamble,', says, top, central, bank, official, business
expected.cleaned_text: A top regional Federal Reserve official sharply criticized Friday
tags: Federal Reserve Bank Of Kansas City
expected.description: A top regional Federal Reserve official sharply criticized Friday the Fed's ongoing policy of keeping interest rates near zero -- and at record lows -- as a "dangerous gamble."
expected.title: Federal Reserve's Low Rate Policy Is A 'Dangerous Gamble,' Says Top Central Bank Official
